title: Recipes
article:
We all have the one food that makes us think of home. Whether it is your Dad’s banana bread or a soup that you get at your favorite restaurant. Everyone has a comfort food or a family favorite recipe that they love.

My Grandmothers Noodle Pudding

9x13 dish

8 oz egg noodles

½ cup. butter

¾ cup sugar

1 cup cut granny smith apples

½ tsp vanilla

½ tsp lemon juice

4 eggs

¾ cup raisin

½ tsp cinnamon





Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.

Cook noodles and then put the hot noodles into a large mixing bowl.

Mix noodles with butter till butter melts.

Add sugar, apples, vanilla and lemon juice. Stir to combine completely.

Add eggs and mix well.

Add raisins and cinnamon and fold into mixture

Put the noodle mixture into the baking dish and bake in the oven for 45 minutes.

*If you would like a recipe to be featured in another article. Please email it to 26asamuels@hannahsenesh.com
author: Ava Samuels
